lines: mched gsum 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
mngon tshe bskal pa dang po la
bcom ldan shAkya seng ge yi
spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin
sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang
rnal 'byor 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i phyir
dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis
gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol
rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che
sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs
gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na
'jig 'gyur 'di la the tshom med
legs ldan nag po dka' thub las
bzlog par byed pa'i bdag po dang
lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo
nag po chen po rdzu 'phrul can
legs ldan nag po sred med bu
phyag rgya chen po lnga rnams kyis
phyag byas pa la bdag bstod do
grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig byed pa
legs ldan nag po dur khrod na
gnas par mos pa ma mo yi
tshogs kyi phyag byas khyod la 'dud
dpal mgon mched gsum lcam bral dang
lha srin sde brgyad 'khor bcas kun
sha khrag dmar gyis brgyan pa yi
mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la
rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas la
nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang
dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang
longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing
zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi
las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol
dam tshig ldan bas bdag la srungs
dngos grub kun gyi grogs mdzod cig
dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang
gdon dang bgegs rnams med par mdzod
rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan
bya byed ngan pa med par mdzod
'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang
'bru rnams rgyas shing chos 'phel dang
bde legs phun sum tshogs pa dang
yid la 'dod pa kun 'grub shog
ces bstod la 'phrin las gzhol
mthu stongs gcig tu bsdus pa'i sku
legs ldan nag po dam tshig can
gtum chen khyed la phyag 'tshal lo
dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du
'jigs su rung ba bskal pa'i me
dmar nag 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na
bzhugs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba
zhal gdangs mche gtsigs hUM skra sgrog
drag po'i spyan gsum glog ltar g.yo
phyag g.yas tsan dan bde chen gyis
srid gsum gdug pa 'dul byed cing
lha chen ma lus zil gyis non
'jom mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
g.yon pa dgra bgegs don snying dang
gsod byed khyed la phyag 'tshal lo
zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs kyis
sa gzhi ri rab khor yug dang
rgya mtshor bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun
g.yo byed khyed la phyag 'tshal lo
sku la dar nag ber chen dang
dug sbrul khros pa'i chun 'phyad dang
dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i mgo phreng gis
brjid pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
rlung ltar 'gyogs shing g.yo ba yi
rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyis phyogs kun tu
dam tshig kun rjes gcod pa yi
myur mgyogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
sgrib med phyogs bcur gzigs pa yi
ye shes spyan ni rnon po yis
'jig rten legs nyes kun gyi stangs
gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po yi
'phrin las kun la thogs med pas
sangs rgyas bstan pa phyogs bcu ru
skyong ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
bstan pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu rnams
yid la ji ltar bsam pa bzhin
mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kun
ster ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo
rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga ru
ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin
rnal 'byor bdag gis bcol ba yi
'phrin las myur du 'grub par mdzod
legs ldan nag po mched gsum 'khor bcas kun
bstan pa bsrung dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad phyir
dpal chen bka' sdod yid ltar mgyogs pa yi
'jigs pa'i gzugs can drag gtum mi bzad pa
gdug pa 'dul mdzad nag po'i phyogs 'joms mdzad
rnal 'byor las la 'bras bu ster mdzad pa'i
mthu stobs byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
sde brgyad btsun mo sras dang g.yog bcas la
dmar chen gtor ma dar nag cod pan can
sha khrag chang phud bcas pa'i dam rdzas 'di
ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlabs nas
ri dang rgya mtshor mnyam pa dmigs te 'bul
dar nag rgyal mtshan rkang dub thod rnga dang
bsur chen dud pa bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dang
stag lpags na bza' ber chen nag po dang
'dod yon rnam lngas khyed kyi thugs dam bskangs
g.yag nag zhol chen sprin ltar 'thibs pa dang
lug nag spyi dkar shel ltar 'tsher ba dang
khyi nag snying dkar dom ltar 'phyong ba yis
legs ldan 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs dam bskangs
bya nag gsob dang 'ug pa'i rgyal mtshan dang
dam nyams dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i sha khrag dang
g.yang gzhi'i bla bre rgyu ma'i lnga ldi yis
legs ldan 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs dam bskangs
'gro mgyogs yid ltar g.yo ba'i rdzu 'phrul can
char sprin lta bu'i ze rdog kun tu g.yo
rta nag mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dis
legs ldan 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs dam bskangs
mgon med 'gro la phan pa'i bsam sbyor dang
thub dbang bstan pa rgyas shing gnas pa'i phyir
bsnyan sgrub mchod gtor sgo gsum dge ba yi
'bad pa ci bgyis de yis thugs dam bskangs
sgo gsum las dang nyon mongs dbang gyur pas
so so thar dang byang sems gsang sngags kyi
bslab gsum nyams ba'i nyes ltung ci mchis pa
dmigs med thugs rje'i dang nas bzod par gsol
ma lus shes bzhin khyad du bsad ba dang
rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig srung mtshams las
'gal zhing nongs par spyad pa bzod par gsol
theg mchog byang chub chen por sems bskyed nas
'gro la phan bde'i bsam sbyor zhan pa dang
rang nyid zhi bde don du gnyer ba yi
rgyal ba'i thugs kyis khrel ba bzod par gsol
rnam dag lta ba'i rang bzhin m+shes bzhin
blang dor spyod pa'i tshul la ma mkhas pas
gsung rab lung gi dgongs don zab mo la
rang bzo 'khrul pas spyad pa bzod par gsol
lta ba yod med phyogs su lhung ba dang
sgom pa rnam g.yeng dbang du gyur pa dang
sbyod pa ngo lkog tshul 'chos ches pa yi
rgyal ba'i gsung dang 'gal ba bzod par gsol
rnam g.yeng dbang gis bsnyen sgrub g.yel ba dang
ser sna'i dbang gis mchod gtor zhan pa dang
rmongs pa'i dbang gis blang ngor mi shes pas
sgo gsum nyes pa'i tshogs rnams bzod par gsol
mdor na spyi dang khyad par dam tshig las
'das shing 'khrul par gyur bci mchis pa
nongs shing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis bshags par bgyi
dmigs med thugs rje'i ngang du bzod bar gsol
nyes ltung 'khrul pa'i rnam smin ma lus pa
nam mkha'i sgrin tshogs rlung gis gtor ba dang
bar snang 'ja' tshon rang sar yal ba ltar
stong gsal gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin du
rnam bar dag cing rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs ltar
'od gsal chos sku'i ngang du zhi gyur cig
